lead_paragraph: Djokovic opened his Australian Open title defense with a straight-sets win, before defending his sport against reports of match-fixing.
snippet: Djokovic opened his Australian Open title defense with a straight-sets win, before defending his sport against reports of match-fixing....

headline.main: Novak Djokovic Rolls at Australian Open
headline.print_headline: Venus Williams Loses, Murray Advances at Australian Open
